info.description:
An API for SUM VIET Don't forget to take it for a spin by clicking on the **Try in Client** button next to each operation!.
For development, please use APIs Doc v2 for up-to-date APIs document now.
__From Backend Summoner With 🧡__
info.title: SUM VIET API

get.summary: user: get one by id (user login)

400.message: new password is duplicate with old password

 user: 7001700 - user not available

 new_code: 7001705 - repeat pin

post.summary: user of  admin path: check KYC

user_pay_order, pay_service_fee, pay_transport_fee, refund_order => s_order 
 | deposit, withdraw =>  s_deposit_withdraw
 | pay_banner_fee => s_banner
